description.text: An $(b;spring)owl$()...it looks like a pluffy bird...Guess we have to $(b;spring)pet$() it to make our list complete!

I'm not sure I like this one...I keeps staring at me from every angle!
 It knows my secrets! It knows my name...
I'm sorry Master Owl...wised of all animals! -The pixie slowly moves away from the owl-
 Let's go Traveler! It looks straight into your soul! I knows the truth! About everything!
